page.title: 11Computers
page.content: I spend a lot of time on my {computer.}It's the{electronic craze}of the early 1980's.There are many types of computers but the most popular{home {ones}are the Spectrum,Commodore 64 and the BBC B. First-time buyers often purchase a {tape recorder}to feed in the tapes but this is a very{slow way}of loading a computer; so people who can afford to will then buy a{disc drive}to load discs instead of tapes. The discs are round and floppy in square cardboard packets. Some people learn enough about computers to{write programmes}of their own but the majority of home-users are content to play the programmed{games now on the market.At school of course we have to have{educational programmes! KERRY PENN PENN
